Lüdecke, D., Makowski, D., Ben-Shachar, M. S., Patil, I., Wiernik, B. M., Bacher, E., & **Thériault, R.** (2023). *easystats: An R framework for easy statistical modeling, visualization, and reporting*. (R package version 0.6.0.7) [Computer software]. https://easystats.github.io/easystats.
